name: :::storm::: hand-dyed rectangle pillow
description:
-storm rectangle pillow-

the perfect pillow for long road trips or impromptu naps on the beach, or to add some modern tie-dye to your place sans the hippie vibe. the wildfire pillow is made from 100% organic cotton that's been hand-dyed with care. black dye produces an amazing effect on this fabric and colors range from black to dark blue, gray and hints of light purple. dyed on both front and back, stuffed with hypoallergenic polyfill and sewn closed.

*dyeing is an organic process that leaves each piece of fabric completely unique, so your pillow will be made to resemble this, but dye pattern will differ, making sure that no two pillows are alike and that you have a completely one-of-a-kind piece.

*as with all handmade items, irregularities may occur and are kind of the best part of the handmade, hand-dyed process.

name: ::black mountain bag:: organic, hand-dyed
description:
the perfect bag for day or night - big enough to carry all your essentials and more, but small enough to tuck under your arm and head out for some fun.

organic, untreated thick cotton canvas is hand-dyed to form deep black+gray swirls. lined with white ramie, a sustainable  eco fabric similar to linen.
two sturdy handles keep the purse snugly under your arm. a small hazel & hunter tag is sewn inside.

-measures approximately 14"x10"
-organic untreated cotton canvas, dyed by hand
-double stitched to make it super sturdy

*hand-dyeing is an organic process which assures that each piece of fabric is completely unique. your bag will be made to resemble the one pictured, but dye patterns will differ. your item will be 100% unique and made just for you - irregularities are considered normal and are the best part of the handmade, hand-dyed process.

**first top photo by André Guérette: http://www.flickr.com/photos/andreguerette/

name: :::smoke clutch: organic, hand-dyed
description:
both beautiful and practical, the smoke clutch is large enough to hold everything you need to carry, day or night.  it's the perfect way to add a touch of cool  to your outfit, all the while keeping all your essentials right where you need them.  

thick organic cotton canvas in natural ivory color is hand-dyed to create unique patterns ranging from light to dark gray, to black. lined with natural linen in white, finished with a leather string zipper pull. a small hazel & hunter tag is sewn inside.

the smoke clutch is large - measures approximately 12"x11" in full, folded approximately 12"x8" (but you can fold it however you like!)

*each clutch is made just for you. please allow up to seven days for your unique item to ship out.

*hand-dyeing is an organic process which assures that each piece of fabric is completely unique. your bag will be made to resemble the one pictured, but dye patterns will differ. your item will be 100% unique and made just for you - irregularities are considered normal and are the best part of the handmade, hand-dyed process. 


photos by andré guérette

name: ::thunder clutch: organic, hand-printed
description:
the thunder clutch is the perfect accessory for autumn (and winter, spring and summer, too!)

the large size makes it perfect to hold all your essentials - it's the perfect clutch to tuck under your arm and head out the door.

thick organic cotton canvas is hand-printed with our hand-drawn brick print in a gorgeous shade of gray. clutch is lined with natural linen in white, with a metal zipper and a small h&h tag sewn inside. only water-based and toxic free inks are used.

measures approximately 12"x9"

*your item will be 100% unique and made just for you - irregularities are considered normal and are the best part of the handmade, hand-printed process. please allow up to seven days before your unique item ships out.

photos by andré guérette
